Breastfeeding practices at six weeks after birth:  A single RCT showed no evidence of 
association between discharge within 24 hours after birth versus later and women not 
breastfeeding at six weeks after birth (RR=0.67, 95% CI 0.41 to 1.09) (3). The overall quality 
of evidence was graded as very low.
